segments.text: Hello , the nurse said that you might have my test results in from the other day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like for you to come in and talk about a few more tests that I would like to run .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this mean that you have bad news for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just want to talk to you about the tests that I want to run .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can ’ t you just tell me now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know anything for certain . We always do a double check if there is a question .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to see you right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can come in this afternoon . If you are feeling too stressed , feel free to bring a friend along .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know for sure that something is wrong !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about a thing ; we are just taking a second look and talking .
segments.speaker: S2
